snippet: For 2014, Lexus tried to make its IS models more sporty. While the company succeeded with the IS 350, the 250 is for those who want a Lexus, but not necessarily a sports sedan.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of 2014 Lexus IS 350.
lead_paragraph: For 2014, Lexus tried to make its IS models more sporty. While the company succeeded with the IS 350, the 250 is for those who want a Lexus, but not necessarily a sports sedan.

headline.main: A Redesign That Hits or Misses
